FMFX

TERMS OF SERVICE

As a Forex funding prop firm, FundMeFX does not have a traditional return policy since we provide traders with capital and resources to engage in Forex trading rather than selling physical products. However, we have certain guidelines in place regarding account closures and fund withdrawals, which are outlined below:

Account Closure

If a trader wishes to close their funded trading account with FundMeFX, they can submit a request to our support team. Account closure requests are subject to review and approval. Once the closure request is processed, the trader's access to the trading platform and associated services will be terminated.

Fund Withdrawal

Traders who have met the specified profit targets and have adhered to the terms and conditions of our funding program are eligible to withdraw funds from their trading accounts. Fund withdrawal requests can be made through the designated process outlined on our platform.

2.1 Withdrawal Eligibility

To be eligible for fund withdrawals, traders must meet specific criteria, which may include reaching a minimum profit threshold, maintaining compliance with risk management guidelines, and adhering to any other conditions set forth by FundMeFX.

2.2 Withdrawal Process

Upon submitting a fund withdrawal request, the trader's request will be reviewed and processed by our team. The withdrawal process may involve verifying the trader's compliance with the funding program rules and regulations. Once approved, funds will be transferred to the trader's designated withdrawal method.

2.3 Withdrawal Fees

FundMeFX may charge withdrawal fees to cover transaction costs associated with fund transfers. These fees, if applicable, will be clearly communicated to traders during the withdrawal request process.
It's important to note that specific details regarding account closures, fund withdrawals, and any associated terms and conditions may be subject to individual agreements or policies that are communicated directly to traders upon joining FundMeFX. Traders are encouraged to review and understand these terms and conditions before participating in our funding program.


RIGHT TO WITHDRAW FROM A CONTRACT

• If you are a consumer, you have the option to cancel a contract within 14 days of its establishment, without providing a reason (refer to clause 2.10 of the Terms & Conditions for information regarding the timing of contract establishment). PLEASE NOTE THAT IF YOU BEGIN DEMO TRADES BEFORE THE SPECIFIED TIME LIMIT EXPIRES, YOUR RIGHT TO WITHDRAW FROM THE CONTRACT WILL BE LOST.
• To exercise your right to withdraw from the contract, you must send a withdrawal notice to our email address support@fundmefx.com within the designated time frame. You can utilize the provided template form to submit your withdrawal. We will promptly acknowledge receipt of the form in written form. If you choose to withdraw from the contract, we will reimburse all fees received from you in the same manner as the original payment, without undue delay (within 14 days after your withdrawal).
• The Provider reserves the right to terminate the contract immediately if the Customer breaches any conditions outlined in Clause 10 of the Terms & Conditions.

DEFECTIVE PERFORMANCES

• If the Services fail to meet the agreed-upon terms or are not provided as expected, you have the right to exercise your entitlements for defective performance. The Provider does not offer any guarantees regarding service quality. You must notify us of any defects promptly, either by emailing us at the specified email address or by contacting us at the address listed in clause 11.2 of the Terms & Conditions. When asserting your rights for defective performance, you can request a remedy for the defect or a reasonable discount. If the defect cannot be resolved, you have the option to withdraw from the contract or claim a reasonable discount.
• We will make every effort to address any complaints you submit as quickly as possible (within 30 calendar days at the latest), and we will provide written confirmation of their receipt and resolution. If we fail to resolve the complaint within the specified time frame, you have the right to withdraw from the contract. To file a complaint, please send an email to our support@fundmefx.com address.

Trading in financial markets is a high-risk activity, and it is recommended that individuals do not risk more than they can afford to lose. FMFX does not provide any investment services listed in the Capital Market Undertakings Act No. 256/2004 Coll. The information on this site is not directed at residents in any country or jurisdiction where distribution or use would be contrary to local laws or regulations. FMFX is not a broker and does not accept deposits. The technical solution offered for FMFX platforms and data feed is powered by institutional liquidity providers.
